name: obsidian-bgtd-plugin
description: This is a sample plugin for Obsidian (https://obsidian.md)

scripts.version: node version-bump.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json
scripts.deploy:setup: cp deploy.config.example deploy.config && echo '✅ Created deploy.config - please edit it with your vault paths'
scripts.deploy:test: npm run build && echo '✅ Build successful - ready for deployment'
